messages.content: can you delete somebody else's comment under your post on linkedin?
I am sorry, as an AI language model, I am unable to delete comments from LinkedIn. However, if you feel that a comment is inappropriate or offensive, you may flag it for moderation.
Sorry I didnt mean you, model, but you as in general, in this case me. I created a post on LinkedIn. Somebody else made a comment I want to remove. Is it possible?

It depends on the platform you are using. Some platforms allow you to delete comments, while others do not. In general, it is best to contact LinkedIn support or the platform's administrator to request the deletion of a comment.
